info.name: CrowdStrike OAuth API
info.description:
# Postman Collection of Endpoints for CrowdStrike OAuth API App on Splunk SOAR.

- ### Prerequisite

The below mentioned are the required fields to use this collection. So, make sure that all these fields are set before running the request.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| client_id  | Client ID ( in environment variables) |
| client_secret |Client Secret ( in environment variables) |
| base_url | EWS URL ( in local variables) |

request.description: This rest call retrieve a token and needed to generate token when token expires

This rest call is used to List processes that have recently used the IOC on a particular device

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | Crowdstrike Device ID to search on |
| ioc | File Hash or Domain to use for searching |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Queries for files uploaded to Crowdstrike for use with the RTR `put` command

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| filter | to filter value |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Queries for custom indicators in your customer account

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| after | for pagination (if there are more page) |

Get the full definition of one or more indicators that are being watched

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| filter | to filter value |
| resource_id | The resource id of the indicator |

Get a list of device IDs on which the domain was matched

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| value | value of domain |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Hunt for a file on the network by querying for the hash

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| value | value of domain |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Set the state of a detection in Crowdstrike Host

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| ids | detection id |
| status | status to set |

Search for incidents by providing an FQL filter, sorting, and paging details

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Search for behaviors by providing an FQL filter, sorting, and paging details

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Query environment wide CrowdScore and return the entity data

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |
Get information about all user roles from your Customer ID

Get information about all user roles from your Customer ID

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| ids | Role ID to get information about |
Get information about all users in your Customer ID

Gets the roles that are assigned to the user

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| user_uuid | crowdstrike unique user id |

Fetch the device details based on the provided query

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Get id for **quarantine device final**

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| filter | to filter value |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Block the device

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| ids | id that we got |

Fetch the details of the host groups

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Assign one or more hosts to the static host group

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| filter | to filter value |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Initialize a new session with the Real Time Response cloud

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | id of device |
| origin | origin ( Ex. phantom ) |

Lists Real Time Response sessions

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Upload indicator that you want CrowdStrike to watch

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| action | Action to take when a host observes the custom IOC |
| platforms | list of platforms |
| type | type ( Ex. ipv4 ) |
| value | Input domain, ip, or hash ioc |
| expiration | expiration time |
| severity | severity level |
| source | Indicator originating source |
| description | Indicator description |
| tags | List of tags |
| host_groups | List of host group ids |
| filename | metadata filename |

Upload an url to CrowdStrike and retrieve the analysis results

We can get all ids and then use these ids to get report by **for report** and **for report detailed** api call

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Upload a file to CrowdStrike and retrieve the analysis results

We can get all ids and then use these ids to get report by **for report** and **for report detailed** api call

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Queries CrowdStrike for the url info

We can get all ids and then use these ids to get report by **for report** and **for report detailed** api call

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Queries CrowdStrike for the file info

We can get all ids and then use these ids to get report by **for report** and **for report detailed** api call

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

We can get report for given **ids**

**ids:** We can use this field to add multiple ids

We can add values like these separated by **&ids=** 

**EX.** 061c7d50bf5&ids=3061c7a3aca&ids=30619b4cb0ba2adc5dccd1f7ad&ids=3061cda1f553c7f5

We can get detailed report for given **ids**

**ids:** We can use this field to add multiple ids

We can add values like these separated by **&ids=** 

**EX.** 061c7d50bf5&ids=3061c7a3aca&ids=30619b4cb0ba2adc5dccd1f7ad&ids=3061cda1f553c7f5

Search for hosts in your environment by platform, hostname, IP, and other criteria with continuous pagination capability (based on offset pointer which expires after 2 minutes with no maximum limit)

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| sort | Property to sort by |
| filter | to filter value |
| limit | limit to set |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Retrieve the details of a process that is running or that previously ran, given a process ID

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| ids | Process ID from previous Falcon IOC search |

Perform a set of actions on one or more incidents, such as adding tags or comments or updating the incident name or description

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| ids | list of incident ids |
| add_tag | tag to add |
| delete_tag | tag to delete |
| update_name | name to update |
| update_status | status to update |
| add_comment | comment to add |
| update_description | description to update |

Get details on behaviors by providing behavior IDs

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| ids | List of incident ids |

Update an indicator that has been uploaded

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| action | "Action to take when a host observes the custom IOC |
| platforms | list of platforms |
| filter | to filter value |
| expiration | expiration time |
| severity | severity level |
| source | Indicator originating source |
| description | Indicator description |
| tags | List of tags |
| host_groups | List of host group ids |
| filename | metadata filename |

To check detonation status of the provided resource id

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| resource_id | id of resource |

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description:
Upload a new put-file to use for the RTR `put` command

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| description | File description |
| filename | name of file |
| comment | comment for audit log |

Execute an active responder command on a single host

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| session_id | id of session |
| device_id | id of device |
| base_command | base command ( Ex. ls ) |
| command_string | data to include with command |

Execute an RTR Admin command on a single host

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| session_id | id of session |
| device_id | id of device |
| base_command | base command ( Ex. get ) |
| command_string | data to include with command |

Get details of a device, given the device ID

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| ids | device id |

to filter device id for **remove hosts final** if we don't have device id

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| filter | to filter value |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Remove one or more hosts from the static host group

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | id of device |
| ids | static host group id |

To download the report of the provided artifact id

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| id | artifact id |

Retrieve results of an active responder command executed on a single host

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| cloud_request_id | Cloud Request ID for Command |

Get details on incidents by providing incident IDs

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| ids | List of incident IDs |

to get ids to delete indicator which will be used in **delete indicator final** api call

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| filter | to filter value |

Delete an indicator that is being watched

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| ids | indicator id |

Get a list of files for the specified RTR session

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| session_id | id of session |

Get RTR extracted file contents for the specified session and sha256 and add it to the vault

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| session_id | id of session |
| file_hash | hash to retrieve |

Deletes a Real Time Response session

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| session_id | id of session |

to get ids for **unquarantine device final**

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| filter | to filter value |
| offset | Starting index of overall result set from which to return ids (defaults to 0) |

Unblock the device

The variable and its Description for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| ids | id that we got |
